\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&,column sep=small]
	{X^p \otimes Y^q} \&\&\& {Y^q \otimes X^p} \\
	\begin{array}{c} X^{p +1} \otimes Y^q\\ \oplus \\ X^p \otimes Y^{q+1} \end{array} \&\&\& \begin{array}{c} Y^q \otimes X^{p+1}\\ \oplus \\ Y^{q+1} \otimes X^p \end{array}
	\arrow["{\varepsilon (p,q)\cdot \tau}", from=1-1, to=1-4]
	\arrow["d"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["d", from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\varepsilon (p+1,q)\cdot \tau}", shift left=5, from=2-1, to=2-4]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\varepsilon (p,q+1)\cdot \tau}"', shift right=5, from=2-1, to=2-4]
	\arrow["\oplus"{marking, allow upside down}, draw=none, from=0, to=1]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
